snippet: The parks department selected the Emerald Green Group, which runs a bistro in Philadelphia and plans to open a smaller, more rustic Tavern in 2013.
abstract: New York City Parks Dept selects the Emerald Green Group to reopen the legendary Central Park restaurant Tavern on the Green; the Philadelphia-based group plans to reopen the space as a smaller, more rustic restaurant in the fall of 2013.
lead_paragraph: The parks department selected the Emerald Green Group, which runs a bistro in Philadelphia and plans to open a smaller, more rustic Tavern in 2013.

headline.seo: New Operator Is Chosen for Tavern on the Green
headline.main: New Operator Is Chosen for Tavern on the Green
headline.print_headline: New Operator Is Chosen for Tavern on the Green
